item.title: Update to about page
item.description:
New section!

Now the about page contains resources, links, channels, etc I consider usefull, also some posts about privacy, open source, and more. I’m now working in translating to other languages, as well to have resources in other languages when possible (or implement some sort of real time translation addon :p)
